revised_title: Modeling the Candle Flame: A Sheet Model Approach
tldr: This article presents a sheet model for the candle flame, using the Burke-Schumann flame-sheet limit to study the combustion process. The model considers the flow induced by the hot flame as a variable-density boundary-layer flow, with transport properties assumed to be proportional to the temperature. The main features of the calculated flame-sheet shape are in agreement with observations of an ordinary domestic candle flame.
